definition: Constructing effective search queries that express an information need in terms the retrieval system can process

positive_examples: Query formulation translated the conceptual question into specific search terms and operators.
Effective query formulation anticipated synonyms and variant terminology.
The query was formulated using Boolean operators to combine concepts appropriately.
Query formulation balanced specificity (precision) against breadth (recall).
training_hints.disambiguation: Strategic construction of effective queries, not mere term entry
